revisions.rev:
{{Merge to|Comparison of disk cloning software|List of disk imaging software|discuss=Talk:Comparison of disk cloning software#Merger proposal|date=February 2010}}
''See Also:'' [[Comparison of disk cloning software]]
== [[Platform independent]] ==
* [[Acronis True Image]] * [[Clonezilla]] * [[dd (Unix)]] * [http://www.horizondatasys.com/363895.ihtml Drive Cloner Rx] * [[FarStone TotalRecovery 7 Pro]] * [[G4L - Disk Imaging]] * [[G4U - Disk Imaging]] * [[Ghost (software)|Norton Ghost (Home and SMB Edition), Symantec Ghost Solution Suite (Enterprise Edition)]] * [[Kleo Bare Metal Backup|Kleo Bare Metal Backup for Servers]] * [[PING (Partimage Is Not Ghost)]] * [[R-Drive Image]]
== [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]] == * [[ACA System Restore]] - not a real disk cloning tool * [[Active@ Disk Image]]{{Citation needed|date=August 2010}} * [[Altiris]] - Deployment Solutions * [http://www.bogusclone.com/ Bogus Clone] - Works differently than most other Disk Cloning Software {{why?|date=June 2011}} * [[Clonezilla]] Freeware hard disk clone tool. * [[DriveImage XML Backup Software]] Runtime Software [http://www.runtime.org/driveimage-xml.htm] * [[Easeus Todo Backup]] [http://download.cnet.com/Easeus-Todo-Backup/3000-2242_4-10964460.html] * [[HDClone]] [http://www.miray.de/products/sat.hdclone.html] * [[Macrium Reflect]] * [[Microsoft Image Backup]] which is part of [[Windows 7]] - does not support compression * [[Paragon Backup & Recovery]] [http://www.paragon-software.com/home/db-express/index.html] * [[Roadkil's Raw Copy]] [http://www.roadkil.net/program.php/P22/Raw%20Copy] * [[Scriptlogic]] - Desktop Authority Image Center * [[StorageCraft]] [[ShadowProtect]] * [[CloudNucleus]] [[StorCube Backup and Recovery]] * [[TeraByte Image for Windows]] * [[TeraByte Image for DOS]] * [[TotalRecovery]] * [[Nero BackItUp]], used nbi documents and could not mirrors images in original version (BackItUp 1 which included in Nero 6), BackItUp 2+ does mirrors images using NBA extension for file backup and NDA extension for drive backup. * [[NTI Backup Now!]] (DriveBackup! is now part of that software), uses NBS backup set extension and NBF files for file-based backup and NPF files for drive-based backup. * [[SelfImage]] - The "dd" for Windows [http://thoren007.free.fr/] * [[RaWrite]] * [[RaWrite2]] * [http://www.smartdeploy.com/ SmartDeploy]
== [[Apple Mac|Mac]] ==
* [[Apple Software Restore]] and [[Disk Utility]] (included with [[Mac OS X]]) * [[Carbon Copy Cloner]]<ref>http://www.bombich.com</ref> * [[CopyCatX]] * SuperDuper!<ref>http://www.shirtpocket.com</ref> * Synchronize! Pro X * DeployStudio * StarDeploy * Clone X * [[Disk Copy]]
== [[Linux]] ==
* [[UDPCast]] - a utility to clone multiple PCs at once using multicast * [[Mondo Rescue]] * [[PartImage]] ([[SystemRescueCD]]) * [[Trinity Rescue Kit]] * [http://www.fogproject.org/ FOG] * [[ntfsclone]] - a utility in the package of ntfsprogs * partclone<ref>http://partclone.org</ref> * [[TeraByte Image for Linux]] * [[Redo Backup and Recovery]] * [[dd (Unix)]]
== [[AmigaOS]] == * Nibbler * QuickNibble * ZCopier * XCopy/Cachet * FastCopier * Disk Avenger * Tetra Copier * Cyclone * Maverick * D-Copy * Safe II * PowerCopier * Quick Copier * Marauder II * Rattle Copy * BurstNibble
